title: Rashida Tlaib: Boycott Bill Maher For Opposing BDS
content:
Rep. Rashida Tlaib ( D-MI ) has now turned her guns on HBO ’ s “ Real Time ” host Bill Maher for daring to criticize the Boycott , Divestment , and Sanctions ( BDS ) movement as a hateful anti-Israel political sentiment with little or no goal beyond the destruction of the Jewish state .
“ Maybe folks should boycott his show , ” Tlaib tweeted , according to Deadline . “ I am tired of folks discrediting a form of speech that is centered on equality and freedom . This is exactly how they tried to discredit & stop the boycott to stand up against the apartheid in S. Africa . It didn ’ t work then and it won ’ t now . ”
On Friday , Maher pivoted his criticism away from Trump and conservatives and toward Tlaib and Rep. Ilhan Omar ( D-MN ) for supporting the BDS movement . His attack came shortly after the pair were barred from entering Israel for having an agenda entirely in opposition to the country ’ s existence .
“ It ’ s a bulls * * * purity test , BDS is a bulls * * * purity test by people who want to appear ‘ woke ’ but actually slept through history class , ” Maher said . “ It ’ s predicated on this notion — I think , it ’ s very shallow thinking — that the Jews in Israel are mostly white and Palestinians are browner , so they must be innocent and correct and the Jews must be wrong . As if the occupation came right out of the blue , that this ‘ completely peaceful people ’ found themselves occupied . Forget about the intifadas and the suicide bombings and the rockets and how many wars . ”
Maher ultimately understood the bans imposed by Israel against Omar and Tlaib given their anti-Semitic pasts .
“ Congresswoman Omar has said things like , ‘ It ’ s all about the Benjamins , ’ ‘ Israel has hypnotized the world , ’ ‘ May Allah awaken the people and help them see the evil doings of Israel , ' ” Maher said . “ She apologized for it , but it ’ s out there : Jews control the world , control the money . ”
Though Rep. Rashida Tlaib has cast herself as the victim in this whole affair , there is speculation that her planned trip to Israel was really just a stunt on her part , given that Israel still granted her a pass to visit her grandmother in the West Bank on humanitarian grounds , which she subsequently turned down .
“ Silencing me & treating me like a criminal is not what she wants for me , ” said Tlaib . “ It would kill a piece of me . I have decided that visiting my grandmother under these oppressive conditions stands against everything I believe in — fighting against racism , oppression & injustice . ”
Israeli Foreign Minister Ayre Deri said Tlaib ’ s refusal to even visit her grandmother proves that her hatred for Israel outweighs her love of family . “ I approved her request as a gesture of goodwill on a humanitarian basis , but it was just a provocative request , aimed at bashing the State of Israel . Apparently , her hate for Israel overcomes her love for her grandmother , ” he said .
Despite all eyes being on Omar and Tlaib ’ s anti-Semitic behavior , neither one seems to have learned their lesson in the wake of this ordeal . As noted by ███ ’ s Ryan Saavedra , both members of congress were recently seen promoting a cartoonist ’ s work on Twitter who has previously mocked Holocaust victims .
